name: King's Last Feast
description:
"There's a party in town! A very, very, exclusive one: the King invited only the richest nobles and made up a great feast! And you are even invited, but you're not a nobleman or a noble lady...you are a very special guest. A Jester arrived from far away to give the king the entertainment he wants. However, he could have just got the wrong one. I wonder what great chaos are you up to bring at the King's Feast."

This is my first published game realized for my first GameJam (Brackeys 2021.2) and it so happens to be a messy game too. I had a ton of fun doing it so it's still valuable to me. Hope you'll find it good too.
